References

From time to time I come across a compelling expository article which provides useful insight into a particular topic. I’ve collected some of these below so I can refer to them easily.

Math

  1. The impact of Thom’s cobordism theory, Atiyah.
  2. Morse theory indomitable, Bott.
  3. A mad day’s work: from Grothendieck to Connes and Kontsevich The evolution of concepts of space and symmetry, Cartier.
